name: Dime Community Bank
description: Please visit our 86th Street Location. The branch is located at 8520 4th Avenue, Brooklyn.

c_branchServices.name: Business Mobile Banking
c_branchServices.richTextDescription: The ability to manage your finances and accounts right in the palm of your hand. Make running your business more efficient with Dimeâ€™s Mobile Business Banking app.

c_branchServices.name: eStatements
c_branchServices.richTextDescription: You can accept e-statements by logging into your online account, clicking on "Accounts" > "eStatements" from the drop-down menu and agreeing to the Agreement. To sign up for eStatements, or if you have a question, please us at 800-321-3464.
Get access to ICS accounts and FDIC insurance with the convenience of Dime
c_branchServices.name: Insured Cash Sweep (ICS)
Municipalities
c_branchServices.richTextDescription: Dime is a partner committed to the success of your municipality. Our Municipal Banking relationship manager will help you through every phase of your operation, promptly answer your questions and provide fast responses to all of your requests.
